word: SECOND: "WE DO NOT MARK OUT ANY PRECISE LINE TO BE FOLLOWED IN DIET."--9T 159. REPEATED WARNINGS WERE GIVEN AGAINST CERTAIN SPECIFIC INJURIOUS FOODS. BUT IN THE MAIN, GENERAL PRINCIPLES WERE LAID DOWN, AND DETAILED APPLICATION OF THESE BROAD PRINCIPLES MUST SOMETIMES BE DETERMINED BY EXPERIMENTATION, AND BY THE BEST SCIENTIFIC CONCLUSIONS AVAILABLE.
